charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1101_0100: On the way back from training with Misty...
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0200:
Thanks for staying late with me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0300: I always get a lot out of training with you!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0400:
We’ve been working hard every day,
and I’m improving little by little.
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0500: Starmie and I aren’t satisfied yet, though!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0700:
One day, I wanna be the brightest star of
all—with Starmie by my side!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_0900:
The world has tons of skilled Trainers,
so number one will take a lot of effort.
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1100:
And not just as a Pokémon Trainer—as a
sync pair, too!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1200:
Back in Kanto, I always dreamed of
journeying to battle strong Trainers.
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1300:
When I came to Pasio, that dream came
true. So now, I’m taking the next step.
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1400: I’ve gotta BEAT all those Trainers!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1500:
I’ve been through a lot and deepened my
bond with Starmie, which led to awakening
my arc suit!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1600:
When I look back on my path up to now,
my dream still looks possible!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_1700: You feel the same, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_0401_1900: Don’t say that! It’s not like you!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_0401_2000:
You’re not alone on your journey to realize
your dream!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_0302_2100: I also wanna be number one!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_0402_2300:
As long as you’re by my side and doing your
best, I won’t give up!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_2400:
It’s easier to stay motivated when you’ve a
friend who shares your dream!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_2500:
As friends—and rivals—let’s see who
reaches it first!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_2600:
I will say this: Once Starmie and I get going,
we can’t be stopped!
charaepi_ch0110_90_kasumi/2301_1201_2800:
and blow right past everyone—beyond the
power of arc suits!
